headline: Can Southwest Airlines’ (LUV) Global Expansion Strategy Redefine Its Long-Term Competitive Position?
summary: In recent days, Southwest Airlines Co. announced a major partnership with Hahnair, expanding its ticketing access to 100,000 travel agencies in 190 international markets, along with completing fixed-income offerings totaling US$1.5 billion in senior unsecured notes due 2028 and 2035. This broadens Southwest’s global distribution beyond the U.S. and strengthens its corporate liquidity, supporting operational flexibility through increased access to international customers and additional...
